instructions: Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap Music. Turn individual playlists on or off.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap Music. Under Playlists & Albums, tap Add Music. Select albums and playlists to add them to your Apple Watch.
Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap Workout. Tap Workout Playlist, then choose a playlist.

Open the Apple Watch app on your iPhone. Tap My Watch, then tap Music. Turn off any automatically added playlists you don t want on your Apple Watch. To remove other music you ve added to Apple Watch, tap Edit, then tap the Delete button next to the unwanted items.

Go to the Apple ID website and sign in with your Managed Apple ID . Tap Security. Tap Add a trusted phone number, enter the phone number and select Text Message or Phone Call, then tap Continue. Enter the six-digit code, then tap Verify.
